1.0.0.name: connect20/Mconnect_Productupload
1.0.0.description: This extension allows admin to upload files to products from Admin Panel products section.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

1.0.1.name: connect20/Mconnect_Productupload
1.0.1.description: This extension allows admin to upload files to products from Admin Panel products section, it allows you to share more information in form of document, it can be PDF, JPG, PNG, DOC, XLS, or it can be media files also like wmv, mp3, etc.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
